trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The forlorn free citizen casts an imploring gaze about the room, catching your eye.
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_TODO_00<tab>Search for the Mystel manservant in the Derelicts.
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the forlorn free citizen.

TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_000_001<tab>At last, eye contact. I know not why, but the other paupers who have passed through avoided my gaze most intently. Dreadfully ill-mannered, the lot of them. I should think they ought to be grateful for the opportunity to complete this task for me─an opportunity that is now yours.

TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_000_002<tab>In short, I require that you locate my manservant, who has served me faithfully for several years. He recently displeased me in adding a touch too much milk to my afternoon tea, and alas, I unthinkingly pushed him into the sea.

TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_100_002<tab>I feel somewhat contrite about that now my mind has been freed of Vauthry's influence, of course─particularly as I've found myself entirely incapable of lacing my boots without assistance, and will be forced to wear these hideous shoes ere he returns.

TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_000_003<tab>Searching for him myself is quite out of the question, naturally. If I could remember his name, I suppose I might call it out, but as matters stand, I am afraid I shall have to rely on you to seek him in my stead.

TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_000_004<tab>The young man is a Mystel of considerable stature, with rather long hair─I do hope he's keeping it well groomed while he's away. I imagine he may be found weeping in the Derelicts or some such.

TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_000_005<tab>When you locate him, please do convey my apologies for having acted in such haste. And tell him, lest there be any doubt, that I should be delighted to have him return to my service.
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_000_006<tab>Yes, yes, of course there will be remuneration for your services. Go on, off with you now.
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_SERVANT03521_000_010<tab>How can I help you?
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_SERVANT03521_000_011<tab>What!? Er, rather─yes, it is certainly I whom you seek.
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_SERVANT03521_000_012<tab>That the master regrets casting me into the sea does come as a surprise, however.
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_SERVANT03521_000_013<tab>For a blessing, I was rescued by some kind-hearted Ondo who happened to be in the area. However, I did feel compelled to offer them my spear in return.

TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_SERVANT03521_000_014<tab>Tragic though it is, given that the master primarily valued me for my services as a bodyguard, it would be quite impossible for me to return to his employ now. Yes, it's out of the question, I'm afraid. Please give him my regrets, and tell him that I will miss him <var 1A 02 /var>dearly<var 1A 01 /var>.

TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_DAMMYA03521_000_015<tab>Yes, he does sound like the sort of fellow who might mistake a Hume for a Mystel, I agree. But I'm afraid I've never set foot above. There's a man to the south who matches the description, though─he may be the one you're looking for.

TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_DAMMYA03521_000_016<tab>Hm? No, I'm afraid I haven't had my hair cut recently. Though if you believe your employer may not be able to tell the difference, I would be happy to accept the role. I'm quite good at swimming.
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_SERVANT03521_000_017<tab>The master has my <var 1A 02 /var>fondest<var 1A 01 /var> regards, you understand.
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_000_030<tab>Why has he not returned with you?

TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_000_031<tab>Oh, dear─I daresay that spear was his only possession. But to replace it is a simple matter, and I shall do so forthwith, now that I know where he may be found.
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_000_032<tab>Ere I depart, do accept this as recompense for your services─it is but a pittance to me, I assure you.
TEXT_LUCKZH011_03521_ARISTOCRAT03521_000_033<tab>Now, I must make haste─he did say that he missed me dearly. I shall have to ask for his name, this time...
